name: Verify Suit Must Be Obtained Before Ladder Access
description: Validates that the ladder cannot be climbed without first obtaining the suit from the wall.
testObjective: Ensure proper item dependency and progression gating for ladder access.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player has identified the suit and ladder in the wall

steps.action: Identify the glowing suit and ladder embedded in the wall
steps.expected: Both suit and ladder are visible and appear interactable

steps.action: Approach the ladder without obtaining the suit
steps.expected: Ladder shows interaction prompt or appears blocked

steps.action: Attempt to interact with the ladder using [E]
steps.expected: Ladder cannot be climbed (interaction is blocked or produces no effect)

steps.action: Approach and interact with the suit using [E]
steps.expected: Suit is obtained and removed from the wall

steps.action: Return to the ladder and interact using [E]
steps.expected: Ladder is now accessible and player can climb

postconditions: Ladder is accessible after suit acquisition
